title: Team fight tactics release live
body: The woes are that long to get on to pbe which is fine, going to be problems hence why itâ€™s pbe but some clarity of when we can expect tft to become live would be nice, no one has a clue not even the top streamer ðŸ˜¶

replies.body: Generally Riot doesn't give specific times/dates for this kind of stuff within the "release patch", but it usually is either upon completion of patch maintenance (about 8am AEST tomorrow morning for OCE, barring any unexpected issues, as per [Service Status page](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) .) or within a few days of the patch going live if Riot wants to sync up the release across all the servers. If TFT isn't available upon completion of the patch maintenance, there *might* be information provided at that point that states a more specific time frame, but probably the best you'll get is "within a few days" (and that's not 100% either, but is usually accurate).
